CustomField.formula: IF($User.UITheme != 'Theme4d' ,IF( Apttus_Approval__Object_Type__c = 'Apttus__Agreement_Term_Exception__c', HYPERLINK(Apttus_Approval__Object_Id__c , "View Agreement Term Exception","_self"), HYPERLINK(Apttus_Approval__Object_Id__c , "View " & Apttus_Approval__Object_Type__c,"_self")), IF( Apttus_Approval__Object_Type__c = 'Apttus__Agreement_Term_Exception__c', HYPERLINK(Apttus_Approval__Object_Id__c , "View Agreement Term Exception","_self"), HYPERLINK("/lightning/r/Opportunity/" & Apttus_Approval__Object_Id__c & "/view" , "View " & Apttus_Approval__Object_Type__c,"_self")))
CustomField.label: Object Link
